content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.a) Describe one cause of the Crimean War (1853–1856).b) Explain one way in which the Crimean War contributed to the breakdown of the Concert of Europe.c) Explain one effect of the breakdown of the Concert of Europe on European political developments in the second half of the 1800s.

frqParts.text: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.a) Describe one cause of the Crimean War (1853–1856).b) Explain one way in which the Crimean War contributed to the breakdown of the Concert of Europe.c) Explain one effect of the breakdown of the Concert of Europe on European political developments in the second half of the 1800s.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
